snippet.title: The Awakener: Forgotten Oath - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the The Awakener: Forgotten Oath announcement trailer. Get a look at some gameplay from this upcoming fantasy action-RPG roguelike, which challenges players to survive 20 waves of battle, teeming with a variety of enemies. Obtain holy relics and artifacts as you progress to enhance your abilities with new fire, ice, and electric attacks. Master different combat schools and beat fearsome bosses in this unforgiving world. Developed in Unreal Engine 5, The Awakener: Forgotten Oath is coming to PC in 2023.

#IGN #Gaming #TheAwakenerForgottenOath
